title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 30.4 - Retention of disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 30.4 - Retention of disclosure

State Regulations

The insurance producer shall retain a copy of any written disclosure provided to the purchaser pursuant to section
30.3
of this Part for not less than three years after the disclosure is given, unless the insurance producer has a written agreement with the insurer that the insurer shall retain such a copy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
30.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
